data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Storozhenko, Sergey Yu. (2018): Pygmy grasshoppers (Orthoptera: Tetrigidae) of Vietnam: the genus Bolivaritettix Günther, 1939. Zootaxa 4374 (4): 497-523, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4374.4.3|46 occurrences
